source_dir.description: Session folder to scan and annotate (defaults to output_session_folder).
source_dir.title: Source Dir

assume_yes.description: If true, skip interactive confirmations and use defaults.
assume_yes.title: Assume Yes

default_brain_area.description: Default brain area suggested to operator per meta file.
default_brain_area.title: Default Brain Area

default_depth.description: Default depth suggested to operator per meta file.
default_depth.title: Default Depth

dynamic_dir.description: Relative destination for dynamic acquisition files (under session folder).
dynamic_dir.title: Dynamic Dir

structure_dir.description: Relative destination for structure stack files (under session folder).
structure_dir.title: Structure Dir

ref_stack_dir.description: Relative destination for reference stack files (under session folder).
ref_stack_dir.title: Ref Stack Dir

manifest_name.description: Filename for the routing/annotation manifest (written under launcher_metadata).
manifest_name.title: Manifest Name

manifest_path.description: Optional manifest path (absolute or relative to session folder) to override the default under launcher_metadata.
manifest_path.title: Manifest Path
